skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: girls can code
des: We're living in a technology driven world. There are not enough women/girls who code. This is a skill that helps to encourage and empower women/girls to want to learn to code. Coding is fun, creative and innovative. Learning to code can help launch exciting careers.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
